name: Quinn Tormey
education: Rowan University, Bachelor's degree in Marketing (2014 - 2018)

experience.description: Collaborating with Samsung Electronics America for over 70 events, including CES, NFT Week, Fashion Week, Newfronts, Rover Touch Campaign, Jaden Smith Activations, and Samsung Galaxy Creator Collective. Managed content and product management, created event plans and Run of Shows, and traveled to multiple markets for event operations and production. Key achievements include co-managing New York and Chicago markets for Samsung’s Rover Touch Campaign, supporting the renovation of the Samsung 837 Flagship Store in NY, and aiding Samsung’s Integrated Launch Platform activation in NY and San Francisco.

Assisted internal production, operations, and account teams within an award-winning experiential marketing agency. Worked on projects for brands such as Amazon Treasure Truck, Google, Hulu, Oreo, Huggies, and Pampers.

Assisted in the production of events and activations for clients like Google, YouTube, Facebook, BMW, Unilever, Investcorp, and Jigsaw. Responsibilities included event planning, coordination, logistics, sourcing, execution, account management, client service, and social media content planning.
Developed and executed a marketing plan, including social media and live video content, as part of a school project implemented by the company.
Coordinated logistics within the marketing and finance teams, attended staff meetings, and executed individual and group programs in a dynamic work environment.

Coordinated pre-audit activities, planned and executed inspection audits across 15 branches, managed communication, tracked team time-management, and liaised with the Chicago office on program goals and performance.
Assisted with managing in-office programs and day-to-day activities, team organization, and information transfer within a non-profit organization serving families in need.
Assisted with marketing campaigns and promotion activations for a retail chain outlet, created social media campaigns and content marketing, and participated in sales meetings and event development.

bio: Event and experiential marketing producer with extensive experience executing campaigns for major brands such as Samsung, Amazon, YouTube, BMW, Unilever, Facebook, and Google within high-energy agency environments. Expertise includes event marketing planning, coordination, logistics, sourcing, execution, account management, client service, content and product management, and creating seamless live experiences for clients.
